sentences.sContent: Have ye suffered so many things in vain? if it be yet in vain.
sentences.sContent_eng: Have ye suffered so many things in vain? if it be yet in vain.
sentences.sCn: 你们受苦如此之多，都是徒然的吗。难道果真是徒然的吗。

sentences.sContent: Have ye suffered so many things in vain?

sentences.sCn: 你们受苦如此之多，都是徒然的吗。
